mapper.insert: insert into member ( id, passwd, name, phone, email, addr1, addr2, addr3 ) values ( #{ id }, #{ passwd }, #{ name }, #{ phone }, #{ email }, #{ addr1 }, #{ addr2 }, #{ addr3 })
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{ id } and passwd = #{ passwd }
mapper.update: update member set phone=#{ phone }, email=#{email} where id=#{ id }
